title: Betrayed Love
overview: The story of three women who are crazy about love, and three men who are trapped in love.Guan Xin, the heiress of Guan Group and is respected by all directors. Her husband Shen Zhuo works for Guan Group and reports to her. And she is also gentle and attentive at home. The most important thing is that she also has a good friend-Xu Jing, with whom you can talk about everything.Reporter Ding Myung Ran considers her job her life, and in order to find the truth, she does not hesitate to take risks in many investigations. She knows many financial sharks and celebrities, and can also smell a sensation in advance.Guan Xin finds out that her husband is cheating on her with her best friend and at a birthday party, decides to talk to him. Ding Meng Ran felt that something was wrong with Shen Zhuo, and later witnessed how Shen Zhuo pushed Guan Xin off a cliff.
